Exaggerate: The claim exaggerates the impact and significance of the road, attributing it to the Modi government when it is actually from an Indonesian village.
Lack enough support: The claim lacks sufficient evidence or support to prove that the road was constructed by the Modi government.
Problematic assumption: The claim assumes that the road in the photograph was constructed by the Modi government based on the tweet of a user who later deleted it.
Exist alternative explanation: The alternative explanation is that the road is from an Indonesian village and not constructed by the Modi government.
